```{r}
read_and_clean <- function(f){
  df <- read_csv(f, skip = 1) # Skip the first row
  df <- df[,-1] # Remove the first column
  col_names <- read_csv(f, n_max=0) %>% names() # Retrieve the column names as a separate csv file
  names(df) <- col_names
  return(df)
}
```
